content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects O JOIN sys.schemas S ON O.schema_id = S.schema_id WHERE O.NAME = 'devs' AND O.TYPE = 'U' AND S.NAME = 'dbo')
CREATE TABLE dbo.devs
	(
	 [C1] nvarchar(4000),
	 [C2] nvarchar(4000)
	)
WITH
	(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	 CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
	 -- HEAP
	)
GO

--Uncomment the 4 lines below to create a stored procedure for data pipeline orchestrationâ€‹
--CREATE PROC bulk_load_devs
--AS
--BEGIN
COPY INTO dbo.devs
(C1 1, C2 2)
FROM 'https://wplushiramsynapseadlsv2.dfs.core.windows.net/wplushiramsynapsefs/devs.csv'
WITH
(
	FILE_TYPE = 'CSV'
	,MAXERRORS = 0
	,ERRORFILE = 'https://wplushiramsynapseadlsv2.dfs.core.windows.net/wplushiramsynapsefs/'
)
--END
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.devs
GO
